TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionTextItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示智慧標籤面板上的靜態文字項目。

span.span: Represents a static text item on a smart tag panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表智慧標籤面板中的個別靜態文字項目。The class represents individual static text items in a smart tag panel. 個別項目會一起以形成一個面板，藉由呼叫傳回的群組相關聯方法。Individual items are associated together to form a panel by returning the group from a call to the method. 大多數情況下，靜態文字項目用來建立具有資訊價值的標籤面板中。Most commonly, a static text item is used to create an informative label in a panel. 按一下靜態文字項目上時，會導致任何動作。Clicking on a static text item causes no action. 衍生的型別通常用來建立不同的分類的標籤。The derived type is typically used to create labels to separate categories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 附加至 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string displayName, string category) cil managed
Public Sub New (displayName As String, category As String)

span.span: The panel text for this item.

param.name: category
param.span: 分類用於群組面板上類似的項目。

span.span: The category used to group similar items on the panel.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式屬性設`null`。The constructor sets the property to `null`. 如需有關如何`category`參數用來群組面板上的項目，請參閱方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 附加至 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233).
